CustomField.description: The date the Trainer Certification is valid to
CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL(TrainerCertAgreementReceived__c), /* Find the number of years that have passed between the Last Cert Agreement and the Initial Cert Date. Certification is valid for that many years */ ADDMONTHS(TrainerInitialCertificationDate__c, 12), ADDMONTHS(TrainerInitialCertificationDate__c, FLOOR(((TrainerCertAgreementReceived__c - TrainerInitialCertificationDate__c) + 365) / 365) * 12) )
CustomField.label: Trainer Certification Valid Until
